title: Communities Around Fort Campbell Brace For Word On Budget Cuts
teaser: This week, the Army  held a town hall meeting at Fort Campbell. The sprawling Army post straddles Kentucky and Tennessee and is a major economic driver for the region. The base could see its military and civilian workforce cut, which would have a drastic impact on the area.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
